description: This file contains configuration snippets, feature definitions, and compile flags related to the MicroBlaze CPU architecture, specifically targeting math features, FPU configurations, and compiler arguments within a Yocto build environment.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains_any
methods.description: Utility function that checks if any of the specified features are present in the given string.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Utility function that checks if a particular feature is present in the given string.
